name: Christmas Fruits
description:
Small typing game with a twist, made for Secret Santa Jam 2020 for my giftee, @ArkosGaming!

Move with arrow keys to grab a particular fruit. Avoid touching other fruits. Clear unwanted fruits from the board by typing their names. Score as many points as possible!

  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Type fruit names with the normal keyboard.
  • ESC to pause.

Score by:

  • Grabbing the particular fruit shown on your HUD (top left corner), +2000
  • Clearing a fruit (fruits with longer names score more points), check How to Play to see the fruit names (you can also hover with the mouse during the game over a particular fruit if you don't know how to write it).
  • You lose points if you touch other fruits (-500x per each level)
  • You win a +10000 bonus if you clear the entire board by typing

You lose if your current score reaches 0 or if the board gets full of fruit.

Hope you like it! Merry Christmas!
